page.title: 18VILLAGE SHOP - HARTFIELD
page.content: There has been a general store in Upper Hartfield for at least 64 years. The present owner runs it single handed. The store is used by everyone in the surrounding area and by passers by. The shop is open all day during the week and mornings at the weekend. The goods supplied are varied - fresh & frozen foods, drink, sweets, clothing, medical supplies, pet food, household goods, stationery, newspapers, toys gifts and more. It has a busy Post Office section dealing with stamps, parcels, pensions, family allowances etc. A post box and Public Telephone are immediately outside. The shop provides an important service to those living in the area.
